abstract.fr: Contrôleur MIDI distant via UDP/IP Multicast
abstract.null: MIDI Remote Controller via UDP/IP Multicast

description.null: QmidiCtl is a MIDI remote controller application that sends MIDI data over the network, using UDP/IP multicast. Inspired by multimidicast (http://llg.cubic.org/tools) and designed to be compatible with ipMIDI for Windows (http://nerds.de).
